SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title AS title,
CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(r.start_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(r.ended_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') ) AS date,
r.room_img AS roomImg
FROM room r WHERE r.host_user_email = #{email}
UNION
SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title AS title,
CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(r.start_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(r.ended_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') ) AS date,
r.room_img AS roomImg
FROM room_join_request j JOIN room r ON j.room_id = r.room_id
WHERE j.request_user_email = #{email} AND j.status = '승인'
ORDER BY date DESC
